text:
First, I'm not impressed by Ant the Definitive guide Either. I am a fan of Ant in Action, but then I'm biased.

Second, what do you mean by <reference>? There is a bit on Ant datatypes and references to them in the manu
http://ant.apache.org/manual/using.html#references

In Ant in Action this is indexed under 'datatypes:references' and 'references', both of which point to concepts on page 73.

The other possibility is that <reference> is an element under some other task, in which case we'd need to know which task you are talking about before we can give a sensible answer.

Incidentally, as an open source project, we celebrate contributions of documentation.
